term.title: hipping

item.text: Isostatic pressing process carried out at elevated temperatures.

notes.item: The pressurizing fluid used in this process is usually a gas.
The temperature is usually in excess of 600°C.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1823 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
